author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 25-year-old student was run over by a speeding lorry on the Mysuru Road flyover on Monday afternoon.

The victim was on his way home from college when the accident took place.

The Traffic police identified the deceased as Vinod Nagappa, a resident of Domlur, who was studying MBA in a private college. Vinod was wearing a helmet at the time of the accident.

The driver of the vehicle has been arrested.

The body has been sent for post-mortem to a government hospital, police sources said.
title: Student killed in road accident
